models.title: Models
models.description: Manage AI models and their configurations

filters.filterByName: Filter by name or model ID...

create.title: Add Model
create.description: Create a new AI model configuration

batchCreate.title: Batch Add Models
batchCreate.description: Add multiple models at once by entering model IDs
batchCreate.validationError: Please fill in all required fields (Developer, Model ID, Name, Icon) for each row

delete.title: Delete Model
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.
delete.bulkDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} models? This action cannot be undone.

association.title: Model Association
association.description: Configure associated models for {{name}}. During request processing, higher priority (lower value = higher priority) associated models will be used first.
association.noChannelModelsAvailable: No models available for this channel
association.noRules: No association rules configured. Click 'Add Rule' to create one.
association.previewDescription: Real-time preview of associated channels and models
association.noConnections: No channel connections. Add rules to see preview.

ruleHints.channelTagsModel: Use model {{model}} in channels with tags: {{tags}}
ruleHints.channelTagsRegex: Use model matching {{pattern}} in channels with tags: {{tags}}
ruleHints.regex: Use model matching {{pattern}} across all channels

status.enableDescription: Are you sure you want to enable {{name}}?
status.disableDescription: Are you sure you want to disable {{name}}?

bulkDisable.title: Bulk Disable Models
bulkDisable.description: Are you sure you want to disable {{count}} models?
bulkDisable.warning: Disabled models will not be used for AI requests until they are re-enabled.

bulkEnable.title: Bulk Enable Models
bulkEnable.description: Are you sure you want to enable {{count}} models?
bulkEnable.warning: Enabling models will allow them to be used for AI requests.

fallbackToChannels.label: Fallback to Channels
fallbackToChannels.description: When enabled, if a requested model is not found in model associations, the system will attempt to find enabled channels that support the requested model directly.

queryAllChannelModels.label: Query All Channel Models
queryAllChannelModels.description: When enabled, models API returns all models from enabled channels. When disabled, only models with explicit Model entity configuration will be returned.

unassociated.title: Unassociated Channels Detection
unassociated.description: Detect channels with models that are not associated with any model configuration
unassociated.noUnassociated: All channel models are properly associated
unassociated.noSearchResults: No models found matching your search

onboarding.title: Welcome to Models
onboarding.description: Let's take a quick tour to help you understand model settings

welcome.title: Models Management
welcome.description: This is where you manage all your AI models. You can configure model associations, settings, and more.

settingsButton.title: Model Settings
settingsButton.description: Click here to access global model settings. Let's explore what you can configure.

fallbackEnabled.title: Fallback to Channels
fallbackEnabled.description: When enabled, if a requested model is not found in model associations, the system will attempt to find enabled channels that support the requested model directly.

queryAllChannelModels.title: Query All Channel Models
queryAllChannelModels.description: When enabled, the models API returns all models from enabled channels. When disabled, only models with explicit Model entity configuration will be returned.
